title: 係時候搞一個「聲援前線消防員」活動

replies.msg:
大家一人一信send去消防處聲援呢位消防員啦。

我寫咗封英文，請原諒小弟語文能力麻麻，勿見怪。你知啦近來真係太多嘢寫我都係用咗少少時間寫出嚟，希望大家改改佢又可以send多封英文。

Dear Sir/Madam,

I write to express my gratitude for the fireman from the vehicle F328. At around 1900 on 2/11/2019, F328 was attacked by the riot police as seen in a video, the fireman reacted promptly and inspected the damage of the vehicle, meanwhile he questioned the police firmly yet clearly, which I consider as professional and appropriate since the behaviour of police recently became unpredictable and unreasonable. This fireman was courageous enough to confront them, risking being assaulted, in order to protect the property of FSD which was essential in carrying out rescue operations to safeguard the people in HK.
There is rumour about this fireman being punished by the department. I hope this is not true because he has done no wrong, instead, he took up the responsibility spontaneously without hesitation which should be appreciated.
Thank you for your attention.

Regards,

Xxxxxxx
A HK citizen
